TestItem.Stem: Which of the sentences below best expresses the essential information in the highlighted sentence in the passage? Incorrect choices change the meaning in important ways or leave out essential information.

Distractor_list.Distractor: The correlation between traits and behaviors in specific situations becomes higher when predictions are made more frequently.
When we observe a person's behavior over a long period of time, we can make fairly accurate predictions about personality traits.
It is more difficult to accurately predict how a person will behave in a specific situation than it is to predict characteristic behavior.
Both traits and typical behaviors can be observed and used to predict the consistency of a person's personality.
